Technique: FORMED BY HAND; PAINTED; ENGRAVED; FAYENCE; ENGRAVED
Name: Shabti of Psemtjek-meryptah
Description: This funerary figurine in green - brown faience was part of the collection É. de Meester de Ravestein. It belonged to the "superintendent of the boats for royal transport", Pdrmtjek-meryptah. The character is also known by a stela of the Serapeum and by other funerary objects. He lived during the reign of Amasis.
